import React from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" const EachProductMobile = ({products, tees, addToCart}) => { const { tag } = useParams() return (
{products.filter(product => product.tag === tag).map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price}

{product.info}

))}
{tees.filter(tee => tee.tag === tag).map(tee => (

{tee.title}

$ {tee.price}

{tee.info}

))}
) } export default EachProductMobile
